components.name: Typography Comparison Table
components.details: Multiple tables with headers, rows for different typography styles, and columns for weight, type style, size, line-height, and character spacing

components.name: Typography Headings
components.details: Headings for different typography categories (e.g., DisplayXLarge, BodyLarge) with varying font sizes and weights

components.name: Section Divider
components.details: Thin horizontal lines separating different typography categories

screens.typography_notes: The screen showcases various typography styles using the Open Sans font family, with different sizes, weights, and line-heights. The layout is primarily grid-based, making it easy to compare different typography styles.
screens.primary_purpose: To display and compare different typography styles for a web application
screens.enterprise_os_potential: This layout could be reused in other design systems or style guides for consistency and comparison of typography styles across different applications or platforms.
